{"id":469018256,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 9 months","timestamp":1615997981,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1036 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/469018256/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Perfect Squares","memory":"6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool is_sqr(long n) {\n        long root = sqrt(n);\n        return root * root == n;\n    }\n    int numSquares(int n) {\n        int m = INT_MAX;\n        int dp[n];\n        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)\n        {\n            if(is_sqr(i + 1))\n            {\n                dp[i] = 1;\n            }else\n            {\n                for(int j = 0; j < i; j++)\n                {\n                    if(dp[j] == 1)\n                    {\n                        m = std::min(m, 1 + dp[i - j - 1]);\n                    }\n                }\n                dp[i] = m;\n                m = INT_MAX;\n            }\n        }\n        return dp[n - 1];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"perfect-squares","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
